attributes.action: Relocate criminals from prison to work camps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
* Britain's prisons are overcrowded.

* Britain's infrastructure is falling apart.

* Labour wages are expensive in the country.

* Prisoners do little in jail until their release.

* Prisoners learn few skills during their internment and are thus ill-equipped to return to the working world.

We should re-house able-bodied, less dangerous criminals in giant, mobile work camps and put them to work, for free. This way, they can:

* rebuild our railways
* maintain our motorways
* clean up our cities
* construct the Olympic Village
* recycle our waste
* AND learn useful construction and maintenance skills, which can be converted into some sort of award/certificate of achievement, facilitating their ability to gain honest employment upon their release.
